ValidationRule.description: When User Select Cash of Mode PickList and Rupees of Mode Selection then Enter data in Cheque/DD No.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Mode__c , 'Cash') , ISPICKVAL( Mode_Selection__c ,'Rupees') , NOT( ISBLANK( Cheque_DD__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: After Selecting Cash of Mode PickList and Rupees of Mode Selection Pick List,You cann't enter in Cheque/DD No.
